text: in infancy - Hepatomegaly - Hyperbilirubinemia - Increased serum lactate - Jaundice - Lactic acidosis - Macrovesicular hepatic steatosis - Microvesicular hepatic steatosis - Mitochondrial respiratory chain defects - Muscular hypotonia - Vomiting - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as
